history.proof: intros d a la ls hd tl H1 H2. unfold pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 in H2. intros n H3 H4 H5. sauto lq: on rew: off depth: 3use: pl_sum, pl_tl_S.

original: intros d a la ls hd tl H1 H2. unfold pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 in H2. intros n H3 H4 H5. apply pl_tl_sum in H3. destruct H3. - inversion H3. - destruct H3 as [a' [la' [ls' H3]]]. subst. apply pl_sum in H4. destruct H4. + inversion H4. + destruct H4 as [a'' [la'' [ls'' H4]]]. subst. apply H2 with (n:=n) in H5. * rewrite <- H5. apply pl_tl_S. apply H3. * apply H4. * apply H5.
